description: This gym offers a wide variety of cardio and strength training equipment, as well as group fitness classes. They also have a pool and sauna.
This yoga studio offers a variety of yoga classes, from beginner to advanced. They also have meditation workshops and pilates classes.
This boxing gym offers training for all levels, from recreational boxing to professional competition. They also have Muay Thai and kickboxing classes.
This boutique spin studio offers high-energy indoor cycling classes. They also have yoga and strength training classes available.
This climbing gym offers a variety of climbing walls for all skill levels. They also have bouldering areas and yoga classes.
This family fitness center offers a lap pool, a leisure pool with slides, a fitness center, and group fitness classes.
